project_description: A simple Flutter app that displays 'Cat' with a person icon which changes to 'Dog' with an access time icon on tap.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular structure with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. State management is handled using the Cubit pattern.

models.animal.dart: File where Animal model is defined

screens.home_screen.dart: File where HomeScreen widget is defined

lib.main.dart: Main entry point of the application

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Main entry point of the application. Sets up the Cubit provider and displays the HomeScreen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main method to run the app.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalCubit which manages the state of the displayed animal.

files.name: lib/models/animal.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model which represents the animal to be displayed.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen widget which displays the current animal and allows toggling.

files.name: lib/widgets/animal_widget.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalWidget which displays the animal's name and icon.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: Displays the current animal and allows toggling between 'Cat' and 'Dog'.

widgets.name: AnimalWidget
widgets.description: Displays the animal's name and icon.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the displayed animal, toggling between 'Cat' and 'Dog'.

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents the animal to be displayed with a name and icon.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the app.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management library for managing state using Cubit.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen: Tap on AnimalWidget
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit: toggleAnimal()
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen: Update state
HomeScreen -> AnimalWidget: Display new animal
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed using the AnimalCubit which toggles between 'Cat' and 'Dog'. The HomeScreen listens to the state changes and updates the displayed AnimalWidget accordingly.
navigation_flow: The app only has one screen, HomeScreen, which displays the AnimalWidget and allows toggling the animal.

pubspec_yaml.name: cubit_example
pubspec_yaml.description: A simple Flutter app demonstrating the Cubit pattern.
